name: Think To Die 2
description: A very hard level based puzzle platformer where your goal is to die to get to the next level. Combine objects, press buttons and time your actions to solve all kinds of puzzles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 64 Bit Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: > 2 GB Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: You need DX11 support & an aspect ratio of 16:9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 , 64 Bit Processor: Intel Core i7 CPU 950 3.07GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: You need DX11 support & an aspect ratio of 16:9
